name: base-rne-inpi
title: Base RNE INPI
description: Permet d'obtenir, à partir d'un numéro SIREN, les informations essentielles d'une société pour pouvoir les intégrer, dans un format spécifique, au sein des encarts de désignation des parties des contrats.
author: fma16

preferences.name: inpiUsername
preferences.title: INPI Username
preferences.description: Your username for the INPI API.

preferences.name: inpiPassword
preferences.title: INPI Password
preferences.description: Your password for the INPI API.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
